title: Upload your pricing schedule
subtitle1: If you have your own pricing schedule ready you can upload it at the bottom of the screen.If you would like a template you can download the document below.
subtitle2: You  will need to make sure you can include ehatvthe pricing model is that you expect supplier to provide.
subtitle3: You can upload any other supporting documents on the next stage.
filedesc: you can upload as many files as you need to, up to a maximum of 1Gb in total. You can only use the following file formats: csv, doc, docx, jpg, jpeg, kml, ods, odt, pdf, png, ppt, pptx, rdf, rtf, txt, xls, xlsx, xml, zip
